wikipedia_page.main: David Ewart Riley Faulkner CB (23 October 1934 – 2020) was a senior research fellow at the University of Oxford Centre for Criminological Research and worked for over 30 years at the Home Office.

link_mentions.page: Richard Faulkner, Baron Faulkner of Worcester
response: Lord Faulkner is married to Susan (née Heyes), with whom he has two daughters. His brother is the civil servant David Faulkner.
* Daniel Faulkner (1955–1981), American police officer for whose murder Mumia Abu-Jamal was convicted; sometimes referred to as David Faulkner
* David Faulkner (field hockey) (born 1963), British field hockey player
* David Faulkner, British Liberal Democrat and former leader of Newcastle City Council
